replies.body:
@Incongruence
NuclearDucky (shared account) = Oldest brother came up with it
DaBaderMC = Meant to be DaBadgerMC, typo. Originally wanted DaBadger but nope xd
Pyrocumulus = Cool cloud
TheXiphias = Swordfish in latin or something
Rapturous = Means happy I think
Gallant = Valiant synonym 

heh

replies.body: What made you apply for staff??? :D
replies.body_tagged: What made you apply for staff??? :D

replies.body:
@SirCyanide
1) I really thought helping the community would be a nice thing after everything they've done for me :^)
2) I was not having that much fun over here anymore, so I thought if I applied, I'd be helping the community and being active :D
